ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Remove activity for inventory details page. Currently is stated as `Coming soon`. This information is already present on the `Completed jobs` tab. It was decided to remove from details page.
